alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:12AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern La Crosse, western Vernon and southwestern Monroe Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stoddard, or 8 miles southeast of La Crosse, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Coon Valley around 1230 AM CDT. Viroqua and Westby around 1250 AM CDT. Cashton around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Roads G And H, Brinkman Ridge, Jersey Valley County Park, Irish Hill, Portland, South Side Of La Crosse, Esofea, Goose Island, Highways 14 61 And County M M and Spring Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
